definitions.definition: Crowded with business or activities; having a great deal going on.
examples: Be careful crossing that busy street.

definitions.definition: Engaged in activity or by someone else; bustling.
examples: The director cannot see you now: he's busy .
Her telephone has been busy all day.
He is busy with piano practice.
Ramzi is busy getting ready for meetings.

definitions.definition: Having much work to do; having much to get done.
Having a lot going on; complicated or intricate .
examples: Flowers, stripes, and checks in the same fabric make for a busy pattern.

main_definition: Crowded with business or activities; having a great deal going on.
secondary_definitions: Engaged in activity or by someone else; bustling.
Having much work to do; having much to get done.
Having a lot going on; complicated or intricate .
